perturbation.original_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Heritage may unilaterally modify the Agreement with 30 days written notice to Premier.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. The original clause states that all other terms remain in effect. The added sentence allows Heritage to unilaterally modify the agreement, contradicting the requirement for mutual agreement implied in the original agreement and the statement that all other terms remain in effect. This creates uncertainty about the stability of the contract terms.

perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Premier reserves the right to interpret the terms of the Agreement at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction. The original clause states the parties wish to amend by mutually agreed terms. By giving premier the unilateral power to interpret the terms, undermines the existing process. This creates uncertainty about how premier might at any point change the interpretation of the terms.
